text:
How I turn any job description into a perfect resume + cover letter, using AI. 

Step #1. Copy the job description.

Go to Linkedin. Copy the job description.

That's almost the hardest step aha.

Step #2. Go to ChatGPT.

Copy-paste my monstrous prompt.

It's in my comment section. 

Step #3. Copy-paste the job description.

Once ChatGPT understood its mission...

...you feed it the whole job description.

It will create:
→ A match map between your CV and the job.
→ A draft resume to fill in.
→ CV tips to fit the role.
→ A custom cover letter.

Bonus #. Add the company's info.

Open another ChatGPT window.

Start your prompt like this:

"I would like to apply for a job position. Here's my cover letter."

Then copy paste your AI cover letter.

And finish the prompt with this:

"I want you to visit their website to get specific details to add to my cover letter."

ChatGPT will fetch their whole website to make your cover letter...even better.

 

Follow Ruben Hassid for more.
